q: Outlook, a pilot program run from 2005-08 by Homeland Security and the Department of Defense which used sophisticated military radar along the border north of Spokane, Washington, to catch low-flying drug aircraft. Operation Outlook successfully identified air-related smuggling trends and patterns and organizations active in cross-border criminal activities along the Spokane sector, said a news release from Kirsten Gillibrand 's office. Among veterans nationally, the rate is 15 percent overall and 20 percent for younger veterans who've served less than five years, Kirsten Gillibrand said. For the men and women who literally risked their lives, giving everything of themselves to defend our country and our freedom, I think going that extra mile really does matter. And I think we should because their unemployment is that much greater, Kirsten Gillibrand said. U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand spoke during a roundtable discussion about the employment future of military veterans held at the Southside Innovation Center. The senator is working with Senate Veterans Committee Chairwoman Patty Murray , D-Washington,

Proponents say the two parks proposed in the legislation would stimulate tourism, create jobs and recognize a civil rights icon whose story is known worldwide. These two national parks in Maryland and Auburn, N.Y., would provide an important place where men and women of all backgrounds can come together and reflect on the significance of her life, Kirsten Gillibrand said. He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome. "I'll never forget this day," an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. Former Brave Jeff Francoeur signed a sweet deal with the Royals.
